sentence: Ms. Barnette has the backing of State Senator Doug Mastriano, who has been the front-runner in the Republican primary for governor, and she has run an unabashedly hard-right campaign, attacking her better-funded rivals as globalists? on the debate stage and questioning their commitment to gun rights and the anti-abortion movement.
title: 4 takeaways from Tuesdays primaries in Nebraska and West Virginia.

sentence: Trump-endorsed state Sen. Doug Mastriano also won the nomination for Pennsylvania governor, but he was already well on track to victory before Trump backed him in recent days.
author: Aaron Blake
title: 6 takeaways from primaries in Pennsylvania, North Carolina and more

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Doug Mastriano, a leading voice against certifying the 2020 election, won the primary for governor in a landslide last week even as the party's old guard warned that he was too extreme to win in November.
title: Trump's Primary Losses Puncture His Invincibility

sentence: Most recently, this trend was on display in DOUG MASTRIANOs victory in the Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial primary (though he rejects the label).
title: POLITICO Playbook: Trumps new obsession
